name: Nightmare Escape (gilwynxxyy)
description:
A simple game where you must escape your Nightmare!~

--

Controls:
*WASD - to move
*left mouse button - to fire
*click - to interact (doorknobs to open doors)

--
Objective:
*survive the nightmare,find the heart and unlock the red door to wake up

--

*note
all assets that were used was taken from Unity free assets
